transcript: Actually, I wanted to go a little farther up because get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid to miss it. How you doing?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Actually, I wanted to go a little farther up the coast, get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid to miss it.  How you doing?
